price: Dan ia memikul beban-bebanmu ke suatu negeri yang kamu tidak sanggup sampai kepadanya, melainkan dengan kesukaran-kesukaran (yang memayahkan) diri.  Sesungguhnya Tuhan-mu benar-benar Maha Pengasih lagi Maha Penyayang,
arabic: وَتَحۡمِلُ أَثۡقَالَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٖ لَّمۡ تَكُونُواْ بَٰلِغِيهِ إِلَّا بِشِقِّ ٱلۡأَنفُسِۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wataḥmilu athqālakum ilā baladin lam takūnū bālighīhi illā bishiqqi al-anfusi inna rabbakum laraūfun raḥīmun
